Package com.optimus.mobile.android

Class Summary
Constants Class name : Constants It defines the constant values that will be required in the application
OAuthRequestTokenTask An asynchronous task that communicates with Twitter to retrieve a request token.
PrepareRequestTokenActivity Prepares a OAuthConsumer and OAuthProvider OAuthConsumer is configured with the consumer key & consumer secret.
ShowTweets class name : ShowTweets Responsible for showing Tweets of the person whose username has been entered by the user.
TweetModel class name : TweetModel.
TwitterAndroid class name : TwitterModule This class declares functions for login, logout, post twette, and show tweets.
TwitterUtilities class name : TwitterUtilities Description : Twitter utilities class Checks whether the user is authenticated or not and defines function to send tweet message
